name: Polka Dot Birthday Number Appliqued Shirt for Boy or Girl with Embroidered Name
description:
Polka Dot Birthday Number Appliqued Shirt for Boys or Girls with Embroidered Name

This listing is for the purchase of one child's shirt with a 6-7" Appliqued Number or Letter. 

Include the child's name and age (or initial) in the notes during checkout. Please let me know what fabric and colors you want for the number. Fabric options are shown here:  https://store-89676.mybigcommerce.com/fabrics-fonts/

A font selection photo is included with this listing.  If you would like to select a font, please include that info with the order.  If you don't state a preference, I will use a font pictured in the sample photos or one that matches the theme of the shirt.

Your item will be sewn on a regular boys or girls cut shirt.  I stock many colors for both boys and girls.  I also offer an option for girls to upgrade their shirt to a frill shirt or dress.  Contact me for help upgrading.  You can read about my shirt color options, here:  https://store-89676.mybigcommerce.com/sizing-store-info/

MAIN KID SHIRT BRANDS USED:  I do reserve the right to substitute brands due to availability from manufacturer.  You can request a onesie versus a shirt if you prefer.  
Monag: 6.0 - 6.5 oz. 100% Ring-spun combed cotton. Please be aware that Monag brand clothing is even sized - this doesn't mean you were given the wrong size as the odd size is implied.
Delta: Delta Magnum Weight tees are 100% preshrunk heavyweight cotton tshirts. They are between 5oz and 6oz cotton weight tees. For detailed measurement and sizing info, please read here:  https://store-89676.mybigcommerce.com/sizing-store-info/

Items are made within 5 business days and shipped via USPS First Class mail (a 2-5 day mailing service).  RUSH service available for $7.50 and are made within 1-2 business days and ship via USPS Priority Mail (a 2-3 mailing day service).  If you need faster, overnight shipping service, please contact me.  

Many shirt themes available, please inquire with your request.

name: Pregnancy Announcement Shirt for Big Brother or Sister in Chevron Fabric for Boy or Girl
description:
Pregnancy Announcement Shirt for Big Brother or Sister in Chevron Fabric for Boy or Girl 

This shirt is perfect to announce your new baby's arrival. Designed for the big brother or sister with his or her name in chevron zig-zag fabric. 

This listing is for the purchase of one shirt with the 'big brother or sister' pictured design. 

Select a fabric from my fabric page here:  https://store-89676.mybigcommerce.com/fabrics-fonts/. Give me the due date birth month and year for the 'effective stamp' and name in the notes during checkout.

name: Pirate Hook and Ship Applique Number or Letter Shirt for Boys with Embroidered Name
description:
Pirate Hook and Ship Applique Number or Letter Shirt for Boys with Embroidered Name

This listing is for the purchase of one appliqued and embroidered shirt. This design includes a 'pirate looking' number or letter filled with red/wht stripe fabric and topped with a black pirate bandanna. The design also includes a pirate ship, pirate hook and embroidered name. The name is done in a 'pirate-y ' font.   

Your item will be sewn on a regular boys shirt.  I stock many colors. You can read about my shirt size options, here:  https://store-89676.mybigcommerce.com/sizing-store-info/   If you do not give a specific shirt color preference, your order will be made in the same colors as shown in the first picture of this listing.
